message.ERROR_NO_INTERNET: We're sorry, it looks like there isn't an Internet connection. Please check your settings and try again.

message.PROFILE_DISABLED: Your access to this site has been permanently blocked for violating the Terms of Service Agreement.
message.GUEST_GATED_BOTH_EMAIL_VERIFICATION: Your account profile includes both your email address, and your parent's email address. Before you can continue, we need to verify both email addresses.
message.GUEST_GATED_EMAIL_VERIFICATION: Your account profile includes an email address that requires verification. Before you can continue, we need you to verify your email address.
message.GUEST_GATED_PARENT_EMAIL_VERIFICATION: Your account profile is associated with your parent's email address. Once your parent confirms your email, you'll be able to sign in.
message.GUEST_GATED_UNKNOWN: You are not eligible to sign in or register on this site.
message.GUEST_GATED_LOCATION: You are not eligible to sign in or register on this site.
message.GUEST_GATED_EMBARGOED: You are not eligible to register on this site. Your information has not been collected.
message.GUEST_GATED_AGEBAND: You are not eligible to register on this site. Your information has not been collected.
message.MISSING_VALUE: Your profile was created without all required information, see input field for details.
message.DISALLOWED_VALUE: Your profile contains a value which is not allowed. Please see the input field for details.
message.INVALID_VALUE_FILTHY: Make sure that your display name does not contain insults or profanity. Be nice!
message.AUTHORIZATION_INVALID_REFRESH_TOKEN: It looks like you haven't used our app in a while.
message.AUTHORIZATION_BLUE_COOKIE_INVALID: We were not able to properly authenticate you.
